Sentence.value: Gender dysphoria used to be known as gender identity disorder.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Gender dysphoria|C0686346]] used to be known as [[gender identity disorder|C0017250]].

Sentence.value: People who are born with ambiguous genitalia, which can raise questions about their gender, may develop gender dysphoria.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[People|C0027361]] who are born with [[ambiguous genitalia|C0266362]], which can raise questions about their gender, may develop gender dysphoria.

Sentence.value: Individual and family therapy is recommended for children to create a supportive environment at home and in school.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Individual and [[family therapy|C0015618]] is recommended for [[children|C0008059]] to create a supportive environment at home and in school.

Sentence.value: Individual and, if appropriate, couples therapy is recommended for adults.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Individual and, if appropriate, [[couples therapy|C0302822]] is recommended for [[adults|C0001675]].
